content:
User: System Glitch: There could have been a technical issue on my end, unrelated to the complexity of your prompt. This might include server-side problems, network issues, or software bugs that prevented me from generating a response.

Grok: Prompt Interpretation: I might have misinterpreted the intent behind your prompt. You were looking for a big idea with immediate implementation, but the way it was phrased could have led me to approach it differently, causing a delay or failure in response generation.
